verses.verse: Now these are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> whom the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> struck, <S%H5221><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrise, <S%H8121><s%> <S%H4217><s%> from the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> eastward: <S%H4217><s%>

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and ruled <S%H4910><s%> from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> even to the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

and the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinneroth, <S%H3672><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> and to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> even the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to Beth Jeshimoth; <S%H1020><s%> and on the south, <S%H8486><s%> under the slopes of Pisgah: <S%H798><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and at Edrei, <S%H154><s%>

and ruled <S%H4910><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and in Salecah, <S%H5548><s%> and in all Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maacathites, <S%H4602><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them. <S%H4872><s%> Moses the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it for a possession <S%H3425><s%> to the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half-tribe <S%H2677><s%> <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

These are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> whom Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> from Baal Gad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak, <S%H2510><s%> that goes up <S%H5927><s%> to Seir. <S%H8165><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%> according to their divisions; <S%H4256><s%>

in the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> and in the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> and in the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> and in the slopes, <S%H794><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and in the South; <S%H5045><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai, <S%H5857><s%> which is beside <S%H6654><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Debir, <S%H1688><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Geder, <S%H1445><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hormah, <S%H2767><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad, <S%H6166><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah, <S%H4719><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tappuah, <S%H8599><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Aphek, <S%H663><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lassharon, <S%H8289><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon, <S%H4068><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron Meron, <S%H8112><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph, <S%H407><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Taanach, <S%H8590><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Megiddo, <S%H4023><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> in Carmel, <S%H3760><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>

the king <S%H4428><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> in the height <S%H5299><s%> of Dor, <S%H1756><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Goiim <S%H1471><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> one: <S%H259><s%> all the kings <S%H4428><s%> <S%H259><s%> thirty-one. <S%H7970><s%>
